keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured £102 million to complete the ringroad around Carlisle and will continue to campaign to improve the A69.
Hosted the Carlisle Skills Fair which has helped young people find apprenticeship opportunities.
Worked with Government to encourage investment into Carlisle with an Enterprise Zone, flights into Carlisle Airport, and a Garden Village.
Secured £390 million for the region as the Borderlands Champion and will campaign for more investment.
Extra police officers being recruited in Cumbria to crack down on anti-social behaviour.
Ensure Carlisle gets its fair share of investment into the NHS for better emergency care and more access to GPs.

issues.health: Ensure Carlisle gets its fair share of investment into the NHS for better emergency care and more access to GPs.
